job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Dasera Inc is a seedfunded security startup focusing on launching our MVP Our mission is to help organizations enable flexible safe internal use of sensitive databrbrDasera was recently selected as a Top 3 startup at RSAC Launch Pad 2020 Watch Noah Johnson our CTO and cofounder present at RSA herebrbrstrongAbout the jobbrbrstrongWere looking to hire fullstack software engineers who are excited to learn new technologies and comfortable diving in to different levels of our stack Although we strongly prefer candidates possess some amount of related experience we care less about specialized skills and more that you are able to learn quickly and willing to contribute wherever is needed As an early team member your work will have a lot of impact and youll help shape the culture of the companybrbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliWork with the engineering team to design build and test our cloudbased platform including frontend backend and servicesliliParticipate in feature estimation feature prioritization sprint planning biweekly sprints code reviews and sprint retrosliliContribute to product development understand customer needs and work with the product team to design plan and implement new features liliSupport early customers of our software by investigating and fixing production issuesliliHelp us improve our processes and make the right tradeoffs between agility cost and reliabilitybrbrliulstrongRequirementsstrongulliBS degree in Computer ScienceliliExperience with at least 2 of the followingliulli2 years backend development eg REST API for enterprise B2B productlili2 years web development React or other framework and HTMLCSS expertiselili2 years Java or Scala experienceliliDevelopment on cloud platforms including AWSliliData warehousedatabase experience as data scientist or DBA and SQL expertiseliulliGood communication skillsliliWilling to learn challenge yourself and share your ideas with the teamliliAble to multitask and wear many hats in a fastpaced environment This week you might lead design of a new feature next week you are fixing a critical bug or improving our CI infrastructurebrbrliulstrongDesirablebrstrongulliPrior experience working at a startup or in a small team experience with agile methodologiesliliCybersecurity experience and adversarial thinkingliliHighly desirable familiarity with program analysis techniques especially static analysis and formal methodsbrbrliulstrongWorking at DaserastrongstrongbrbrstrongWe have ambitious goals but we need the right people to help us get there We believe in working harding but not burning out We value individuals but work together and share credit as a team We avoid egos and office politics at all costs We strive to build an open supportive culture where everyone enjoys coming to work each day and feels their contributions are appreciated We hire people who share these valuesbrbrstrongWhat to expectbrbrstrongAfter you submit your CV well send you a 60minute online coding exercise to complete at your convenience Then well set up a phone call to get to know you better Finally well invite you to our office to meet with other team membersbrbrOur move fast startup mentality extends to our interview process if your schedule permits we can complete this process and provide a decision in less than a weekbrbrPowered by JazzHRbrbrwOrBnVc63p
